      IConfig load​(java.lang.String sUri)  
      ICmdEncDecLib newCILBuilder()
      Returns a new instance of ICmdEncDecLib.

      It is guarranted that a new instance is returned, if there is an error, application aborts.
      ICandi.IBuilder newLanguageBuilder()
      Returns a new instance ICandi.IBuilder that allows to manage several languages transpilers, compilers and interpreters, as described in module "candi" in "config.json" file.

      It is guarranted that a new instance is returned, if there is an error, application aborts.
      IXprEval newXprEval()
      Returns an empty instance of IXprEval.

      It is guarranted that a new instance is returned, if there is an error, application aborts.
      IConfig set​(java.lang.String module, java.lang.String varName, java.lang.Object newValue)
      Replaces an existing value for an existing variable in an existing module by a new value.
      If the variable does not exists, it will be appended to the module.
      If new value is a string, it must be enclosed by double quotes ("").
      If the module does not exists, an exception is thrown.
      IConfig setCliArgs​(java.lang.String[] as)
      Add received Command Line arguments to config, so config will also use these arguments to look into.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        IConfig load​(java.lang.String sUri)
      throws java.io.IOException

      • get

        <T> T get​(java.lang.String module,
          java.lang.String varName,
          T defValue)
        Returns the Java value for 'varName' (case is ignored), or 'defValue' if 'varName' was not found.

        The variable is attemped to be read using following sequence of priority:
        1. If not empty, it is searched at ::asCliArgs (set by ::setCliArgs(...))
        2. Using Java System.getProperty(...)
        3. O.S. environment variables using System.getenv(...)
        4. Module received in configuration JSON file
        If neither found, null is returned.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Returned value.
        Parameters:
        module - Module to search for the varName (can be empty).
        varName - Name of the variable to retrieve its value.
        defValue - To be returned if the variable does not exist or null if 'varName' is an empty string or null.
        Returns:
        The value (an Une valid data value) for passed variable name (case is ignored), or null if not such variable.

      • set

        IConfig set​(java.lang.String module,
            java.lang.String varName,
            java.lang.Object newValue)
     throws MingleException
        Replaces an existing value for an existing variable in an existing module by a new value.
        If the variable does not exists, it will be appended to the module.
        If new value is a string, it must be enclosed by double quotes ("").
        If the module does not exists, an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        module -
        varName -
        newValue -
        Returns:
        Itself.
        Throws:
        MingleException

      • setCliArgs

        IConfig setCliArgs​(java.lang.String[] as)
        Add received Command Line arguments to config, so config will also use these arguments to look into.
        Parameters:
        as - CLI arguments.
        Returns:
        Itself.

      • newLanguageBuilder

        ICandi.IBuilder newLanguageBuilder()

        It is guarranted that a new instance is returned, if there is an error, application aborts.
        Returns:
        An instance ICandi.IBuilder
